title: feat: merge Docs page into Play page Integrate section
author: ElliotEtag

gist.headline: Docs meet Play
gist.blurb: We've merged the documentation right into the playground! Now you can grab live API URLs for your creations without switching tabs.
gist.summary: Integrated the documentation page into the Play page's new 'Integrate' section, offering live, copy-pasteable API URLs for image, text, and audio models.
gist.impact: Developers can now instantly generate and copy valid API requests for their specific model configurations directly from the UI.
gist.visual_concept: The concept is 'learning while playing'. The bee is in a pixel art playground, but there is a computer terminal or code scroll integrated into the play structure. The bee is happily interacting with code in this playful environment.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the chubby 8-bit bee mascot sliding down a playground slide that transforms into a stream of glowing pixelated code. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and peach gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting. Lo-fi vibes like A Short Hike. Playful and technical. Nostalgic but beautiful.

image.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the pollinations.ai bee connecting a retro game controller to a glowing holographic code terminal. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Represents merging play and documentation. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
